languages.text: "Эта ситуация не стоит времени Вольного Торговца. Абеляр, ты проявил вопиющую некомпетентность, отныне расхлебывай все свои проблемы сам. Выметайся и забери эту выскочку с собой".
"This matter is not worth the Rogue Trader's time. Abelard, you have acted with staggering incompetence. From now on, you will sort out your own problems. Get out, and take that upstart with you."
languages.original_text: "Эта ситуация не стоит времени Вольного Торговца. Абеляр, ты проявил вопиющую некомпетентность, отныне расхлебывай все свои проблемы сам. Выметайся и забери эту выскочку с собой".

traits.locale_text: "This matter is not worth the Rogue Trader's time. Abelard, you have acted with staggering incompetence. From now on, you will sort out your own problems yourself. Get out and take that upstart with you."
"This matter is not worth the Rogue Trader's time. Abelard, you have acted with staggering incompetence. From now on, you will sort out your own problems. Get out, and take that upstart with you."
"This matter is not worth the Rogue Trader's time. Leave the bridge and don't ever disturb me again!"
"This matter is not worth the Rogue Trader's time. Leave the bridge and don't ever disturb me again!"

"This matter is not worth the Rogue Trader's time. Abelard, you have acted with staggering incompetence. From now on, you will sort out your own problems yourself. Get out and take that upstart with you."

"This matter is not worth the Rogue Trader's time. Abelard, you have acted with staggering incompetence. From now on, you will sort out your own problems. Get out, and take that upstart with you."

languages.text: “这件事情根本不值得行商浪人亲自浪费时间。阿贝拉德，你的表现实在是太无能了。从现在开始，这件事情你必须自行解决，赶紧带上那个自大的家伙一起滚蛋。”
languages.original_text: "This matter is not worth the Rogue Trader's time. Abelard, you have acted with staggering incompetence. From now on, you will sort out your own problems. Get out, and take that upstart with you."

traits.locale_text: “这件事情根本不值得行商浪人亲自浪费时间。阿贝拉德，你的表现实在是太无能了。从现在开始，这件事情你必须自行解决，赶紧带上那个自大的家伙一起滚蛋。”

languages.text: «Este asunto no merece la atención de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Abelard, su incompetencia ha sido patente. De ahora en adelante, ocúpese de sus problemas. Lárguese y llévese a ese advenedizo».
languages.original_text: "This matter is not worth the Rogue Trader's time. Abelard, you have acted with staggering incompetence. From now on, you will sort out your own problems. Get out, and take that upstart with you."

traits.locale_text: «Este asunto no merece la atención de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Abelard, su incompetencia ha sido patente. De ahora en adelante, ocúpese de sus problemas. Lárguese y llévese a ese advenedizo».

languages.text: 「この件は自由開拓者の時間を割く価値はない。アベラルド、お前の無能さには反吐が出る。これからは一切の面倒を見てやらん。さっさと失せろ。あ、その増長した小僧も一緒に連れて行け。」
languages.original_text: "This matter is not worth the Rogue Trader's time. Abelard, you have acted with staggering incompetence. From now on, you will sort out your own problems. Get out, and take that upstart with you."

traits.locale_text: 「この件は自由開拓者の時間を割く価値はない。アベラルド、お前の無能さには反吐が出る。これからは一切の面倒を見てやらん。さっさと失せろ。あ、その増長した小僧も一緒に連れて行け。」

languages.text: "Diese Angelegenheit ist die Zeit {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} nicht wert. Abelard, Ihr habt eine erstaunliche Inkompetenz an den Tag gelegt. Von nun an kümmert Ihr Euch um Eure eigenen Probleme. Geht und nehmt diesen Emporkömmling mit."
languages.original_text: "This matter is not worth the Rogue Trader's time. Abelard, you have acted with staggering incompetence. From now on, you will sort out your own problems. Get out, and take that upstart with you."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Angelegenheit ist die Zeit {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} nicht wert. Abelard, Ihr habt eine erstaunliche Inkompetenz an den Tag gelegt. Von nun an kümmert Ihr Euch um Eure eigenen Probleme. Geht und nehmt diesen Emporkömmling mit."

languages.text: « {mf|Un libre-marchand|Une libre-marchande} n'a pas de temps à perdre avec ces sottises. Abélard, vous avez fait preuve d'une incompétence crasse. Désormais, vous réglerez vos problèmes vous-même. Partez, et emportez cette petite révolte avec vous. »
languages.original_text: "This matter is not worth the Rogue Trader's time. Abelard, you have acted with staggering incompetence. From now on, you will sort out your own problems. Get out, and take that upstart with you."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Un libre-marchand|Une libre-marchande} n'a pas de temps à perdre avec ces sottises. Abélard, vous avez fait preuve d'une incompétence crasse. Désormais, vous réglerez vos problèmes vous-même. Partez, et emportez cette petite révolte avec vous. »

languages.text: "Bu mesele, Hür Tacir'in vaktini harcamaya değmez. Abelard, akıl almaz bir beceriksizlik sergiledin. Bundan böyle kendi sorunlarını kendin halledeceksin. Defol ve o züppeyi de yanında götür."
languages.original_text: "This matter is not worth the Rogue Trader's time. Abelard, you have acted with staggering incompetence. From now on, you will sort out your own problems. Get out, and take that upstart with you."
